describe: The Balinese-Javanese is a hearty and healthy breed.
color: Balinese - seal point, chocolate point, blue point and lilac point.

describe: Bengal Cats are curious and confident with the tameness of a domestic tabby and the beauty of an Asian Leopard Cat.
the American Wirehair is an American original, with a completely unique wired coat.
color: Average, considered moderately talkative and an enthusiastic purrer.
